   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to BIOLink's documentation!
===================================

**BIOLink** (/bio'link/) is a fortran 90 coupling code to use biogeochemical models ( BLOOM/PEPTIC/METEOR) with the hydrodynamic model CROCO.

Check out the :doc:`usage` section for further information, including how to :ref:`install <installation>` the project. 

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
   
   installation
   usage
   tutorial
   programming_style
   functions_description
